# Warahirka

Warahirka or Wara Hirka (Quechua, wara trousers / bee, Ancash Quechua hirka mountain, Hispanicized spellings Huarajirca, Huara Jirca) is a mountain with an archaeological site of the same name in Peru. It is situated in the Hu√°nuco Region, Yarowilca Province, Pampamarca District, about 1.5 km from Pampamarca, near La Florida and Warahirka (Huarajirca).
